statements: SELECT * FROM VisualizationData WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT data_segmentation, visualization_type FROM VisualizationData WHERE data_value > 100
SELECT user_id, data_segmentation FROM VisualizationData ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT visualization_type FROM VisualizationData
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM VisualizationData
SELECT user_id, data_value FROM VisualizationData WHERE data_segmentation = 'segment_a' ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM VisualizationData WHERE visualization_type = 'scatter_plot' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, visualization_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM VisualizationData GROUP BY user_id, visualization_type;
SELECT user_id, AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM VisualizationData WHERE visualization_type = 'bar_chart' GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_data_value > 50 ORDER BY avg_data_value DESC;
SELECT visualization_type, SUM(data_value) AS total_value FROM VisualizationData GROUP BY visualization_type HAVING total_value > 1000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id WHERE quantity > 5 AND age < 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, age, purchase_date, product_name FROM users JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY age ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases >= 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, username, total_amount FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price <= 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY category, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT group_name, user_count FROM user_groups;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE description ILIKE '%premium%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT group_name, user_count FROM user_groups WHERE user_count > 100 ORDER BY user_count DESC;
SELECT visualization_id, data FROM visualization_data WHERE user_group_id IN (SELECT group_id FROM user_groups WHERE user_count < 50);
